name: PAT_ENC_MSP_EGHP3
description: This table contains the Tertiary Employer Group Health Plan Info part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file. Some questionnaires use this as the family member's EGHP info rather than the 'tertiary' EGHP info.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: HAS_EGHP3_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has a tertiary employer group health plan. Y indicates that the patient has a tertiary employer group health plan. N indicates that the patient does not have a tertiary employer group health plan. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.

columns.name: EGHP3_CUR_EMPL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the employer group health plan is through the subscriber's current employment. Y indicates that the plan is through the subscriber's current employment. N indicates that the plan is not through the subscriber's current employment. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.

columns.name: EGHP3_100_EMP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the employer that sponsors the group health plan has 100 or more employees. Y indicates that the employer that sponsors the group health plan has 100 or more employees. N indicates that the employer that sponsors the group health plan does not have 100 or more employees. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.

columns.name: EGHP3_INS_NAME
columns.description: Name of the employer group health plan's insurance company.

columns.name: EGHP3_INS_ADR_1
columns.description: First line of the employer group health plan's insurance company's address.

columns.name: EGHP3_INS_ADR_2
columns.description: Second line of the employer group health plan's insurance company's address.

columns.name: EGHP3_INS_CITY
columns.description: City part of the employer group health plan's insurance company's address.

columns.name: EGHP3_INS_ZIP
columns.description: Postal code part of the employer group health plan's insurance company's address.

columns.name: EGHP3_BEN_PKG
columns.description: The benefit package number or policy ID number for the employer group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: Group number for this employer group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_MEMBER_NUM
columns.description: Patient's membership number for this employer group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_INSURED_NAME
columns.description: Name of the group health plan's subscriber.

columns.name: EGHP3_REL_PT_C_NAME
columns.description: The group health plan's subscriber's relationship to the patient.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_NAME
columns.description: Name of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_ADR_1
columns.description: First line of the address of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_ADR_2
columns.description: Second line of the address of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_CITY
columns.description: City part of the address of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_ZIP
columns.description: Postal code part of the address of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.

columns.name: EGHP3_EMPL_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number of the employer that sponsors this group health plan.
